messages.messageBody:
> On Jul 9, 2004, at 6:44 PM, R.Mangrum wrote:
>
> Can some help me find a picture of a mounted Hachiwari? I have
looked
> in all the books that I have. I see plenty of pictures of the
blades
> but none of the entire mounted piece.
>

Richard -

I have a mounted hachiwari on my tanto page at:

http://www.geocities.com/alchemyst/unji.htm

Rich S

------------------------------------------------------------
Richard Stein, PhD alchemyst@...

http://www.geocities.com/alchemyst/nihonto.htm

messages.subject: Re: Hachiwari
messages.msgSnippet: Rich- A little late getting back to this, I uploaded pics of my Hachiwari which is a bit different from the bokuto Dragon we saw earlier. They are in the Toryu
messages.messageBody:
Rich-
A little late getting back to this, I uploaded pics of my Hachiwari
which is a bit different from the bokuto Dragon we saw earlier. They
are in the Toryu folder in the Nihonto group photos section on Yahoo
groups. If you can't make your way there let me know and I'll send them
to you off list,
Tom


On Jul 9, 2004, at 6:44 PM, R.Mangrum wrote:

> Can some help me find a picture of a mounted Hachiwari? I have looked
> in all the books that I have. I see plenty of pictures of the blades
> but none of the entire mounted piece.
>
> Thanks
> Richard
>
